sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 医生检查了受伤的部位。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yīshēng jiǎnchá le shòushāng de bùwèi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le médecin a examiné la zone blessée.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The doctor examined the injured area.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 你需要改变你的生活方式。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ xūyào gǎibiàn nǐ de shēnghuó fāngshì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tu dois changer ton mode de vie.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You need to change your lifestyle.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个计划还有很多不足。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège jìhuà háiyǒu hěn duō bùzú.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce plan présente encore de nombreuses lacunes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This plan still has many shortcomings.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle a une silhouette très élancée.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She has a very slim figure.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a vérifié le document à plusieurs reprises.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He checked the document repeatedly.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'aime manger des sandwichs au jambon.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I like to eat ham sandwiches.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il va au travail en moto tous les jours.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He rides a motorcycle to work every day.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xìtǒng gěi chū le cuòwù tíshì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le système a affiché un message d'erreur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The system gave an error prompt.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'entreprise recrute des talents.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The company is recruiting talent.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les astronautes travaillent dans l'espace.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Astronauts work in outer space.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen bào le yī gè lǚyóu tuán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous avons réservé un voyage en groupe.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We signed up for a tour group.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bāng wǒ ānzhuāng zhège ruǎnjiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez m'aider à installer ce logiciel.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please help me install this software.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les jeunes sont pleins de vitalité.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Young people are full of vitality.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他强调了安全的重要性。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā qiángdiào le ānquán de zhòngyàoxìng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a souligné l'importance de la sécurité.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He emphasized the importance of safety.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 学生在学校打架是不对的。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xuéshēng zài xuéxiào dǎjià shì bù duì de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il n'est pas bien que les étudiants se battent à l'école.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It's wrong for students to fight at school.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les données montrent que les ventes augmentent.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The data shows that sales are growing.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons utiliser pleinement notre temps.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We should make full use of our time.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī suǒ yīliú de dàxué.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est une université de premier rang.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a first-class university.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La réunion a été annulée.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The meeting was cancelled.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les déchets doivent être triés et recyclés.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Garbage should be sorted and recycled.
